values.description:
Seven Ways provides supported accommodation in Brighton and Hove for young people who have been in the care of the Local Authority and who need to develop practical and emotional skills prior to managing their own tenancies. 

Seven Ways offers a unique combination of services, providing support to care leavers and their social workers where it is needed most. We provide a safe platform from which young people can test and develop their independence: 

• a service exclusively for care leavers with best practice assured 
• direct support from support workers 365 days a year 
• great one bedroom flats with furnishings 
• a strategic approach helping young people to achieve their personal targets 
• commitment from resilient, versatile and effective workers 
• flexibility 

Our care packages are specially designed for each individual, created in partnership with social workers, and rigorously reviewed to ensure effectiveness. 



Seven Ways is run by Jon Mackie who has over thirteen years post-qualifying social work experience in East Sussex and the Brighton & Hove areas.
values.name: Seven Ways (Support) Limited

values.description: We offer a professional 3 yr teacher training course to become an Alexander Teacher. We also offer short courses for those interested in applying the AT to their musicianship, or horse riding or who wish to explore the delights of human balance and good use. We have something for everyone. We are approved by STAT and accredited by the OCN. We run regular CPD events.

I offer bespoke French language courses and lessons held at home and at work  

Levels from beginners to advanced are taught, including children and mother-toddler lessons. 

These are either on a one-to-one basis or small groups with two or more students.

The Landmark Group is a growing specialty insurance brokerage located in Rochester, New York.  The company provides consulting broker services primarily to firms in the construction, manufacturing and high technology industries in upstate New York. The focus of their work includes property & casualty coverage, surety bonding and employee benefits.   A Personal Lines division assists individuals and families with insurance coverage for their auto and home.
values.name: The Landmark Group of Brighton, Inc.

values.description:
The firm of choice in Brighton & Hove - delivering a truly professional service, with a personal touch.

We are a leading law firm in Brighton and Hove with a reputation for delivering excellence and innovation in legal services. We have been a cornerstone of the Sussex business community for over a century and successfully blend modern practices with traditional values:

•we are fair and ethical at all times
•we employ the best people
•we aim to get the best outcomes for our clients
•we believe it is both courteous and professional to keep you fully informed
 
Our core areas are property, services for businesses, wills, probate and trusts, family law and litigation & dispute resolution.

Our approach to fees is to ensure that there are no surprises, agreeing costs or budgets at the outset wherever possible.  We are authorised by the Legal Aid Agency to undertake publicly-funded work in the file of Child Care.
values.name: Woolley Bevis Diplock LLP incorporating Tennant & Knight
Rock Paper Image
values.description:
Providing SEO solutions in Brighton and around Sussex for small business websites.

Design, build, hosting and SEO for small companies in Brighton and around Sussex.

Lucraft Hodgson & Dawes Chartered Accountants were established in Brighton, in 1947 and have offices in Brighton and Rustington.

At Lucrafts our purpose is to make all your dealings with the taxman as painless and efficient as possible.

We don’t believe in making tax or accountancy any more complicated than it has to be, which is why doing business with us is simple:

1. We meet you for a free consultation about your business needs.

2. We then establish exactly how we can help you.

3. We provide you with an approximate costing.

Finally, we’ll get on with the job in hand, leaving you to focus on what you do best…running your business.
values.name: Lucraft Hodgson & Dawes

values.description: Church of Christ the King is a church based in Brighton, England. It is part of a wide network of churches known as New Frontiers. The church's aim is to love and serve the city of Brighton and the people who live there and to tell the message and story of Jesus that is found in the Bible.

Digital United is evolving! 

Du is not just another agency. It's a whole new way of working. It's a place where independent, talented people own the company and not the other way round.
